_c: The first project is a special project that is used as a placeholder for the legal notice page.
name: Legal Notice
12V LED Dimmer
desc: A NE555 based light dimming circuit for 12V led strips

desc: A warpper for the multiprocessing library to build threaded classes easier

desc: A simple breakout board to test a 20MHz clocked 328pb

desc: This system builds a portfolio website based on your GitHub profile

desc: A lightweight fancy box alternative build in pure JavaScript

name: Make BlockXY Upgrade

name: Plastic Straw Marker

desc: Upgraded parts for the budget Geeetech "Prusa" i3 3D printer

desc: A very simple client side CMS system that dynamically loads content on the fly

desc: My personal custom symbol and footprint library that is extended over time
